name: Telemetry and RC (min)
info:
# Connect via USB-Telemetry Radio to Pixhawk 4 with Telemetry Radio

MAVlink telemetry information is received automatically

Additional control messages (RC) can be transmitted via message input

**Requires:**
npm install mavlink
npm install serialport
npm install process

**Add to functionGlobalContext (in settings.js):**
**Windows:**
mavlink:require('C:\\Users\\<user>\\node_modules\\mavlink\\src\\mavlink.js'),
SerialPort:require('C:\\Users\\<user>\\node_modules\\serialport')
process:require('C:\\Users\\<user>\\node_modules\\process')
**Linux:**
mavlink:require('/home/pi/node_modules/mavlink/src/mavlink.js'),
SerialPort:require('/home/pi/node_modules/serialport'),
process:require('/home/pi/node_modules/process')

**Download newest common.xml from:**
https://github.com/mavlink/mavlink.git

(fix mavlink.js to not show warnings for 64bit-types)


**Environmental variables:**
On Windows: COM3
On Linux/Raspberry Pi: /dev/ttyACM0
